alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Okaloosa and east central Santa Rosa Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Baker, or 8 miles southwest of Crestview, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Okaloosa and east central Santa Rosa Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
